#include<stdio.h>
#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    long int n;
    cin>>n;
    int a[n];
    for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)
        cin>>a[i];
        sort(a+1,a+n+1);
        int mid=n/2;
        if(n%2==0)
        cout<<a[mid]<<endl;
    else
        {
        cout<<a[mid+1]<<endl;
        }
    return 0;
}
